description:
This market will resolve according to which team that wins the Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship scheduled January 15-18, 2026.

If at any point it becomes impossible for the listed team to win the Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship (e.g. they are mathematically eliminated), the corresponding market will resolve to "No".

Ties in standings will be broken according to the official ALGS rules. 

If the 2026 ALGS Championship cancelled, postponed after January 31, 2026, or there is otherwise no winner declared within that timeframe, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ALGS website (https://algs.ea.com/year-5/champs-2026). However, a consensus of credible reporting (e.g., Liquipedia at https://liquipedia.net/apexlegends/Apex_Legends_Global_Series/2026/Championship) may also be used.

events.title: Apex Legends GS 2026 Championship: Winner

question: Will SBI e-Sports win the Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship?
